doc:
Mary Tarcai https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Tarcai 0 Mary Tarcai (July 6, 1906 – September 22, 1979 in New York City) was an actress. She was born in the Austro-Hungarian Empire, immigrated to the United States with her family when she was a child and grew up in Cleveland, Ohio.She began her career as an actress at the Neighborhood Playhouse in New York City and later taught there. Her background was in the Stanislavski method and in New York at the beginning of her career she worked with Isaac Boleslavsky and Maria Ouspenskaya. After leaving the Neighborhood Playhouse she went to Atlantic City, where she started her own theater and produced her own shows. She then went to Los Angeles and worked with the Actors' Lab for seven years and also as an assistant to many film directors. Returning to New York in 1955, she began teaching acting, both at the Neighborhood Playhouse and privately. She was one of the first to teach classes centering on cold readings. Her students over the years included Shirley MacLaine, Florence Henderson, Charlotte Rae, Edmond O'Brien, Valerie Harper, Raymond Burr, Julie Newmar, Ralph Waite, Lilia Skala, Ann B. Davis. She was married to Arthur H. Singer, a writer on the original Star Trek series, until his death in 1978. Mary_Tarcai ( July_6_,_1906 – September_22_,_1979 in New_York_City ) was an_actress . She was_born in the_Austro-Hungarian_Empire , immigrated to the_United_States with her_family when she was a_child and grew up in Cleveland , Ohio.She began her_career as an_actress at the_Neighborhood_Playhouse in New_York_City and later_taught there . Her_background was in the_Stanislavski_method and in New_York at the_beginning of her_career she worked with Isaac_Boleslavsky and Maria_Ouspenskaya . After leaving the_Neighborhood_Playhouse she went to Atlantic_City , where she started her_own_theater and produced her_own_shows . She then went to Los_Angeles and worked with the_Actors '_Lab for seven_years and also as an_assistant to many_film_directors . Returning to New_York in 1955 , she began_teaching acting , both at the_Neighborhood_Playhouse and privately . She was one of the_first to_teach classes centering on cold_readings . Her_students over the_years included Shirley_MacLaine , Florence_Henderson , Charlotte_Rae , Edmond_O'Brien , Valerie_Harper , Raymond_Burr , Julie_Newmar , Ralph_Waite , Lilia_Skala , Ann_B._Davis . She was_married to Arthur_H._Singer , a_writer on the_original_Star_Trek_series , until his_death in 1978 .
